sentences.en: Drugs drove him remorselessly to an early death.
sentences.cn: 毒品毫不留情,过早地夺去了他的生命.

sentences.en: In this state, the voice of the preacher thundered remorselessly, but unavailingly, upon her ears.
sentences.cn: 因此, 那位布道者的声音虽在她耳畔残酷无情地响如雷鸣, 但却无济于事.

sentences.en: It will lecture on disinterested purity while its neck is being remorselessly twisted toward a skirt.
sentences.cn: 在训诫无私的纯真的时候它的脖子却为了短裙而执意扭曲.

sentences.en: The police pursued the criminal remorselessly.
sentences.cn: 警方追捕那罪犯毫不松劲.

sentences.en: There have been record bankruptcies and remorselessly rising unemployment.
sentences.cn: 破产案数量达到最高纪录，失业率持续上升。

sentences.en: These models remorselessly comb the markets for arbitrage opportunities.
sentences.cn: 这些模型无情地扫荡市场的套利机会.

words.tran_cn: 冷酷的；不知过错的；坚持不懈的；不屈不挠的
